Title 1

Services

Service A

I will draw a small portrait (yes I do pet portraits as well!) or a design of your choice rendered in pencil, fully shaded. OR any design of your choice. Dimensions range from 5x7 to 8x10. Background elements = extra charge.

Service B

I will create a small colored pencil portrait (yes I do pet portraits as well)! OR any design of your choice. Dimensions range from 5x7 to 8x10. Background elements = extra charge.

Service C

I will create a small watercolor portrait (yes I do pet portraits as well!) OR any design of your choice. Dimensions range from 5x7 to 8x10. Background elements = extra charge.

Service D

I will do small to large scale paintings periodically. Message me or email @SkyleeLPerkins@gmail.com to inquire about price, duration, and subject matter.
